member.name: M:Gemmob.Observer.EventObserver`2.RemoveListener(`0)
member.summary: Remove ALL callback listener by `key`. Be carefully, use at OnDestroy only to free RAM.

member.name: M:Gemmob.Observer.EventObserver`2.RemoveAllListener
member.summary: Remove all listener. Be carefully, use at OnDestroy or OnApplicationQuiting only to free RAM.

member.summary: Send multi params to dispatcher

member.name: T:Gemmob.EventDispatcher
member.summary:
Use this when you want to dispatch a message to other listener in your system, to do reduce instance and reduce reference together.
Call "SetEnableDebugLog" to show debug log

member.name: M:Gemmob.EventDispatcher.RemoveAllListener
member.summary: Becarefull. Should use when your game has only one scene, or all your game logic place in only one scene (except logoscene).

member.name: M:Gemmob.EventDispatcherExtension.AddListener(UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour,System.Int32,System.Action{System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Short call of "EventDispatcher.Instance.AddListener", this will auto add a component into caller gameobject
If "untilDisable" = true, observer will use OnEnable to register listener and OnDisable to remove listener, else use Awake and OnDestroy
member.param: If true, observer will use OnDisable to remove listener, else will use OnDestroy
